Headline: #85A North Central Temporary Reroute near Central/Elston
ShortDescription: 85A North Central buses temp. rerouted SB: Central, Devon, Milwaukee and Elston; NB: Central, Elston, Milwaukee, Devon and Caldwell: near Central/Elston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85A North Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Central/Elston, due to street blockage near Central/Elston.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, Devon, Milwaukee and Elston including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Central, Elston, Milwaukee, Devon and Caldwell.

Allow extra travel time.
